data.message: I'd like to see none. Thank you.

replies.message: Hey Anthony. You can't get rid of Facebook ads entirely because they help keep Facebook free. We strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. -Hailey
Hey Anthony, you can use Adblock and it'll clear those annoying ads right out! Check it out!
Amen Joshua!! Been using it for YEARS! Just say NO to FB ads!

Hailey, from what I remember facebook use to have very little ads. Their purpose as you've described. Now you're doing it because you're greedy, not for a free Facebook interface. In fact ads that are relevant/interesting to me and others will only bring more clicks to that advertiser thus a higher revenue for you. When will I HAVE ENOUGH come back to America.
